titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: I celebrated at 8 a.m: read Mattins at 10 a.m: assisted at the Choral Eucharist at 11 a.m: preached at 7 p.m.
Bob, Tommie^Hall^, Frank^Capon^, Harman, & Frank Green came to tea & stayed to Evensong & supper afterwards.
